summary: Anonymized investor Q&A from multiple seed fundraising conversations.

questions.question: What specific pain point is urgent enough to buy now?
questions.answer: Describe the high-cost workflow and why existing tools fail.

questions.question: Who signs the contract and what budget owns this?
questions.answer: Identify the title, budget line, and internal champion.

objections.objection: Why does this require a new vendor?
objections.response: Show measurable savings and a short implementation plan.
